Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.

I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price, but I am also willing to negotiate. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I understand that you are a student and have a limited budget. I am willing to negotiate the rental price, but I am also looking to maximize my gains as a landlord. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am asking for a monthly rental price of 1200 Euros. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you can provide a valid reason for the reduction.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1200 Euros.

I would also like to ask if there are any additional costs that I should be aware of, such as utilities or maintenance fees.

Also, I would like to know the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. How long is the agreement for and what are the penalties for breaking the agreement?

Lastly, I would like to know if the apartment is available for move-in immediately.

Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Nesibe, thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month. As for additional costs, I will provide you with a detailed breakdown of the utilities and maintenance fees prior to the move-in date. The utilities will be billed to you monthly and you will be responsible for paying them. The maintenance fees will be paid annually and will cover any necessary repairs or upkeep of the apartment.

The rental agreement will be for a minimum of one year, with a renewal option for another year. If you break the agreement before the end of the term, you will be responsible for paying a penalty fee equivalent to three months' rent.

The apartment is available for move-in immediately. I will provide you with the necessary documentation and paperwork once the rental agreement has been signed.

Thank you for choosing my apartment, Nesibe, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
